original_title: Atreyu - Carry the Fire: Lead Sails Paper Anchor
overview: OC metalcore mainstays ATREYU have announced the “Carry the Fire” livestreams. The second stream will find the band playing 2007’s Lead Sails Paper Anchor in full and takes place on Friday, December 4.
title: Atreyu - Carry the Fire: Lead Sails Paper Anchor
